name: Animal Crosses The Road - Endless Arcade Hopper
name_original: Animal Crosses The Road - Endless Arcade Hopper
description:
Animal Crosses The Road is a new 3D adventure star game arrived in market.
Its flashy, addictive, challenging, refreshing, adventurous, Colorful, Fun.
Animals from Forest entered the Marshland by mistake and it needs to pass through the Forest by running & jumping.
Everybody know how horrific its to cross with getting under geometry obstacles like sawtooth, traps, flames.

You need to control the animal to jump lane by lane and avoid dashing any sawtooth, traps, flames. Its that simple.
Challenge with global users with Cross Roads.

Lets Get Criss Crossy.

Features of Animal Crosses The Road
* Best of colors and 3 D graphics.
* Realistic sounds
* Stunning animations
* Easy to play
* Endless game play.
* Global Leaderboard
